.. |lgrass| replace:: :mod:`lgrass`

.. _lgrass_reference:

Reference guide
#################

This manual details, for each module of |lgrass|, 
the functions and objects included in |lgrass|, 
describing what they are and what they do.

.. contents::

.. currentmodule:: lgrass.__init__

*********************************************************

    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:
    :synopsis:
.. include:: lgrass.lpy
